titleStmt.title: Orders and articles granted by the high and mightie Lords of the States General of the Vnited Prouinces, concerning the erecting of a VVest India Companie together with the priuiledges and rights giuen vnto the same.
titleStmt.author: United Provinces of the Netherlands. Staten Generaal.
West-Indische Compagnie (Netherlands)

notesStmt.note: Concerning the formation of the Nederlandsche West-Indische Compagnie.
Reproduction of a photostat of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
